LongDescription: Additional cooling infrastructure allows emitters such as radar jammers to run longer and more often.
FlavorText:
I was part of the team that was tasked to develop these and I like to think we did a job well done. It's the same concept as the refrigeration suite for the safety shutdowns on reactors, just applied on a smaller scale and only triggered when the attached components are activated.

There's the occasional problem that comes up where a nick in the wiring from battle damage might turn it into a heater instead of a cooler, but that's not part of my job.

- S. Ace, CWO
FormattedBuffs:
Burst Duration (Emitters): <color=#4CFF72>+25%</color>
Cooldown Time (Emitters): <color=#4CFF72>-20%</color>
Overheat Damage Chance (Emitters): <color=#4CFF72>-10%</color>
